Articles.Content:
Hello, fellow Kerbonauts! My name is Jeb Kerman. I got into the game when I saw Robbaz\'s gameplay on Youtube, and I love it. My motto is \'\'I want it huge, unstable, prone to overheating and a good chance it will blow up if you look at it from the wrong angle. I didn\'t become a Kerbonaut for an easy ride, dammit!\'\' That pretty much is what I think about rockets.

My first time with a rocket didn\'t turn out so well, I should have done the tutorial first. But, I am getting better and I will try to land on the Mun.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
